articles.author: Anneken Tappe, CNN Business
articles.title: The Fed's favorite inflation measure hit a fresh 40-year high - CNN
articles.description: Americans had to reach deeper into their pockets in March, as yet another key inflation index showed prices hit a fresh 40-year high.

articles.title: Why the Great American Lawn is terrible for the West's water crisis - CNN
articles.description: As the West runs out of water, officials are eying what experts say is one of the leading culprits in the crisis: water-guzzling grass lawns.

articles.title: Elon Musk tweets meme about America's political polarization as the left goes farther left - Fox Business
articles.description: Elon Musk, whose $44 billion bid for Twitter was recently accepted, tweeted on his new platform a meme about polarization in American politics on Thursday, suggesting that his views haven't changed but the left has become more extreme.
